data.name: CRATES N' MOHAWKS
data.detailed_description:
An arcade experience with a focus on chasing that high score!

  • Fast-paced action - straight to the point
  • Short and sweet gameplay - each round is approx. 5 minutes
  • 9 guns from crates to constantly switch between and challenge yourself
  • 7 colorful and unique enemies to give the middle finger
  • Waves increasing in challenge 'til death or glory
data.about_the_game:
An arcade experience with a focus on chasing that high score!

  • Fast-paced action - straight to the point
  • Short and sweet gameplay - each round is approx. 5 minutes
  • 9 guns from crates to constantly switch between and challenge yourself
  • 7 colorful and unique enemies to give the middle finger
  • Waves increasing in challenge 'til death or glory
data.short_description: Oi! Gun down and roll through waves of enemies in this arcade twin-stick shooter where surviving and collecting the highest number of gun crates is the only rule!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 3865U 1.80 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon violence, violence against minorities or vulnerable groups
